Comments: Welcome to AMIGOpy (A Medical Image-based Graphical platfOrm - Python)! This is an evolution of the previously developed MATLAB-based software AMIGOBrachy. While AMIGOBrachy was a user interface tailored specifically for absorbed dose calculations in brachytherapy coupled with MCNP6 MC code, AMIGOpy extends this functionality and brings a plethora of new features, with a Python backbone and VTK for image rendering.
